game.name: Animal Style
game.shortDescription: You're a cat running your own hotdog shop! Use realistic fluid physics to sauce a huge variety of foods. Encounter fun objects with many unique challenges. Manage your shop, unlock upgrades, save the furry residents of Pawston, and make sure not to lose your balance....
game.shortDescriptionEn: You're a cat running your own hotdog shop! Use realistic fluid physics to sauce a huge variety of foods. Encounter fun objects with many unique challenges. Manage your shop, unlock upgrades, save the furry residents of Pawston, and make sure not to lose your balance....
